original_text: And when Hadad heard in Egypt that David slept with his fathers, and that Joab the captain of the host was dead, Hadad said to Pharaoh, Let me depart, that I may go to mine own country.
korean_text: 하닷이 애굽에 있어서 다윗이 그의 조상들과 함께 잔 것과 군대 지휘관 요압이 죽은 것을 듣고 바로에게 아뢰되 나를 보내어 내 고국으로 가게 하옵소서

sentences.original_text: And when Hadad heard in Egypt
that David slept with his fathers
and that Joab the captain of the host was dead
that I may go to mine own country
